recommended_adrs: ADR-002: Multi-tenant Data Isolation for SaaS
ADR-003: Event Sourcing vs State Management
cross_cutting_concerns.sequencing_recommendations: The technical implementation should follow this sequence: 1) Complete Commerce Foundation core (BCS and Decision Engine) as these are foundational, 2) Implement minimal Agentic CPQ with basic Quote Builder Agent to validate architecture, 3) Build Configurator Service in parallel as it's needed by both current and future CPQ, 4) Layer in advanced features (goal seeking, visual config) only after core is stable. Critical decision point: whether to pursue full APEX compatibility or force migration to new patterns - this will significantly impact timeline and customer adoption.
